revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Ammo | name = Phosphorus grenade rounds | class = PhosphorusGrenadeRounds | game = Strife | doomednum = 153 | convid = 178, 171, 175 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:Ammo|Ammo]]→PhosphorusGrenadeRounds
A bundle of four phosphorous grenades for Strife's [[Classes:StrifeGrenadeLauncher2|grenade launcher]]. The second-most dangerous weapon of Strife's arsenal, right after the [[Classes:Sigil|Sigil]], it creates fires that continuously damage anything that comes near. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR PhosphorusGrenadeRounds : {{Class|Ammo}} { +{{Flag|FLOORCLIP}} {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 4 {{Property|Inventory.MaxAmount}} 16 {{Property|Ammo.BackpackAmount}} 4 {{Property|Ammo.BackpackMaxAmount}} 32 {{Property|Inventory.Icon}} "I_GRN2" {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_PHGRENADES" // "Phoshorus-Grenade Rounds" {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_PHGRENADES" // "You picked up the Phosphorus-Grenade Rounds." States { Spawn: GRN2 A -1 Stop } }
